text: Ezɨ atrivimɨn gumazir dapaniba, ofa damuasa uaghan asɨzir avɨriba gumazamiziba ko, ofa gamir gumaziba ko, Livaibagh anɨngi. Ezɨ ofa gamir gumazibar dapanim Hilkia ko, Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn garir gumazir igharazimning Sekaraia ko Jehiel, me dughiar ekiar kamɨn uaghan ofa damuasa, sipsipɨn nguzir bar avɨriba ko, memen nguziba inigha ofa gamir gumazibagh anɨngi. Dar dɨbobonim, 2,600ɨn tu. Egha me 300plan bulmakaun apuriba inigha, God bagh ofa damuasa, ofa gamir gumazibagh anɨngi.
